feature.label: FRC Java Development Core
feature.description:
Core toolset for FRC robot software using Java
Plugins that provide tools to program the FIRST Robotics Competition cRIO in Java. Includes ability to create new simple and iterative robot projects, sample projects, and correctly modify the manifest using Eclipse's integrated refactoring tools. Also includes launchintegration, with shortcuts to build, run, and debug FRC Java projects. Includes a preference page to set team number and file locations, as well as help content.
